## bubbles.TextBubble class

A bubble that displays non-editable text. Used by the warning icon.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TextBubble extends Bubble 
```
**Extends:** [Bubble](./blockly.bubbles_namespace.bubble_class.md)
